channel.title: network-ansible on networkop
channel.description: Recent content in network-ansible on networkop

item.title: Automating the Build of a FlexVPN Network
item.description: In this post I’ll show how to automatically build configuration files for Hubs and Spokes in FlexVPN network topology

item.title: Automating New Network Build - Part 2 (BGP)
item.description: In this post we’ll have a look at how to automate a typical BGP setup

item.title: Automating New Network Build - Part 1
item.description: This post will demonstrate how to automate the build of a typical enterprise branch network consisting of a pair of WAN routers, a core switch and 3 access layer switches. I will show how to create the initial bootstrap configuration and enable basic routing with OSPF

item.title: Automating Legacy Network Configuration
item.description: In this post I’ll show how to take an already established network, pull out some of the common configuration pieces and put them all into a standard Ansible environment

item.title: Network Configuration Automation
item.description: This post will give a brief overview of network configuration automation, describe its challenges and benefits and will set off a series of posts showing how to automate a configuration of a typical enterprise network
